<script>
	import news from "./components/news.vue";
	import news2 from "./components/news2.vue";
	import history from "./components/history.vue";
	import text from "./components/text.vue";
	import mouse from "./components/mouse.vue";
	export default {
		name: "App",
		components: {
			news,
			news2,
			history,
			text,
			mouse
		},
		mounted() {
			this.getData();
		},
		methods: {
			getData() {
				let self = this;
				api.get("data", { papername: "rmap1" }, data => {
					Data = data;
					store.state.loaddata = Math.random();
				});
				api.get("", {}, data => {
					console.log("@@@", data);
				});
				api.get("user", { code: "9090" }, data => {
					console.log("!!!", data);
				});
				api.get(
					"html",
					{ url: "https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%94%90%E6%9C%9D" },
					data => {
						console.log("###", data);
					}
				);
			}
		}
	};
</script>

<template>
	<!-- <news2 /> -->
	<history></history>
	<!-- <text></text> -->
	<!-- <mouse></mouse> -->
</template>

<style scoped></style>
